message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs. Given its value and quality, I believe it would greatly benefit you. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. This is a fantastic deal considering its market value and the significant discount provided. I hope you find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing how it can enhance your experience.
